name: Congatenation
description:
With WASD you control one of the sides of the conga. With arrows you control the other one. Join everyone together!

Maximize the window if it's completely collapsed. Alt+enter to enter fullscreen.

Credits:
Roger Nogué
Aniol Andrés
Alec Lafita
Sergi Cruz
Gerard del Castillo (aslogd) 

Built with: https://github.com/albertvaka/nbgf
